name: Custom Fields Account Registration For Woocommerce
author: silverplugins217

sections.description:
Custom Fields Account Registration For Woocommerce allow to build add fields in account pages.

Its allow you to make checkbox, radio button, text , button and many other field in your account pages. it make also first name, last name , company name, city as well other billing address fields and shipping address fields.

When user register account form at that time send email to customer with customize email subject and email message.

FEATURES FOR CUSTOM FIELDS ACCOUNT REGISTRATION FOR WOOCOMMERCE:

  • Easy To Use
  • Enable/Disable Authentication
  • Enable/Disable User Registration Email
  • Change Login And Registration Title Text
  • Add/Remove Custom Registration Fields
  • Hide And Show Field Labels
  • Change Field Required Message Text
  • Change My Account Custom Tab Title Text
  • Change My Account Custom Tab Form Heading Text

ðŸ“½Documentation | ðŸ“½Get Pro | ðŸ“½Support

FEATURES FOR CUSTOM FIELDS ACCOUNT REGISTRATION FOR WOOCOMMERCE PREMIUM:

  • Registration field types ( Country, file upload, Password, Textarea, custom html, Color, time, Date, Radio, Select, multiple checkbox, multiple select, ) options.
  • Change User Registration Email Subject Message
  • Change User Registration Email Body Message
  • Enable/disable State field & required option.
  • State field width, label & slug option.

CONTRIBUTE AND TRANSLATE

Custom Fields Account Registration For Woocommerce is translated into multiple languages Chinese, Dutch, Russian, Spanish, and many more. Help localize Woocommerce even further by adding your locale Language. Click Here
sections.faq:
How to Use Custom Fields Account Registration in Woocommerce

this plugin shows field only on default WooCommerce user registration form.this plugin save your custom Registration fields on My Account Page.
